minesweeperStart:
How to play:
Rows: 0-9, Columns: A-I.
If you wanna reveal a tile, use (ROW)(COLUMN) to reveal it.
If you wanna flag or unflag a tile, use @(ROW)(COLUMN).
Game ends when a mine is uncovered or all flags are used.
